TopicTitle: Shaking, flashing lights and alarms in IVA during re-entry

Articles.Content: You could use a combination of ShipEffects (for IVA reentry sounds) and KerbQuake (if you are playing a version prior to 1.0). There's probably a bunch of 'low altitude alarm' type mods as well. I don't think there are any mods that make visual changes to the IVA during reentry, but I would love to use a mod that does that if one ever comes out.
